OOC: Oops! I forgot Blackfang yesterday!

Bic:

Blackfang tought for a moment. He wanted to make her play but also to
train her. How could he do both? Then, it dawned on him.

Blackfang: That could be a great idea. I have a great game in mind.
Let's call it "Catch the drone". I'll send five drones in the forest
and you'll have to capture them. How about it?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "raccoon7679" <raccoon7679@y...> wrote:
> Cam::
> 
> She transformed into fox kit mode and started to nip at Blackfang's 
> heels. "Wanna play?"
